duties_responsibilities.duty: Pre-inspect truck, load materials, and verify accuracy of load
Set up job parameters, inspect site to ensure a safe environment to unload
Minimal touch freight – may need to occasionally lift, push, or move product weighing 75+ pounds
Adhere to safety policies and regulations while always wearing appropriate PPE and ensuring safe loading and unloading
Maintain regular communication with dispatcher to ensure timely delivery of the product
Ensure branch management is aware of potential hazards on site
Maintain compliance with and understanding of safety policies and regulations

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A CDL license in good standing with 12 months of verifiable commercial driving experience
